title: Fitness Tracker Mobile App
desc: A cross-platform mobile app designed to track workouts and health metrics in real-time. About Project: Developed to encourage fitness with an intuitive UI, cloud syncing, and personalized analytics.

title: Payroll Management Website
desc: A Vue.js-powered web application for streamlined employee payroll management, featuring secure authentication, automated calculations, and detailed reporting.

title: Budget Planner Mobile App
desc: A mobile app for personal finance management, offering budgeting tools and expense tracking. About Project: Designed to simplify financial planning on the go.
